Issue #79: Resume Upload & Parsing Experience
Phase 2 | P0 | 1 week
- Drag-and-drop resume upload (PDF/DOCX)
- AI parsing with progress indicator
- Extracted data review/edit interface
- Multiple resume version support
- ATS optimization suggestions

Issue #80: AI Resume Builder (Interactive Wizard)
Phase 2 | P0 | 2 weeks
- Step-by-step resume builder wizard
- AI-powered content suggestions
- Multiple templates (ATS-optimized)
- Real-time preview
- Export to PDF

Phase 2 | P1 | 1 week
- Edit profile information
- Manage resume versions
- Update job preferences
- Privacy settings
- Account deletion

Phase 2 | P1 | 1 week

- Multiple filter combinations
- Saved searches

Phase 2 | P0 | 1 week

- Fit Index with detailed breakdown
- Company profile integration
- Similar jobs section
- Apply/Save actions

Phase 2 | P0 | 1 week

- Resume/cover letter selection

Phase 2 | P0 | 2 weeks
